title: CEDH Tier List
description: This is a comprehensive guide to the CEDH tier list. It includes information on the best decks in the format, as well as tips for choosing a deck that is right for you.
heading: CEDH Tier List
introText: This is a comprehensive guide to the CEDH tier list. It includes information on the best decks in the format, as well as tips for choosing a deck that is right for you.

data.itemDescription: A Simic value deck that can generate a lot of mana and card advantage

data.itemName: Kraum, Ludevic's Opus / Tymna the Weaver
data.itemDescription: A Temur control deck that can disrupt its opponents' plans and win the game through combos or card advantage
A Bant superfriends deck that can cheat out powerful planeswalkers and ult them for the win

data.itemName: Rograkh, Son of Rohgahh / Silas Renn, Seeker Adept
data.itemDescription: A Mardu aggro deck that can quickly kill its opponents with powerful creatures and direct damage
A Naya warrior tribal deck that can swarm the board with creatures and win through combat or non-combat combos
An Izzet storm deck that can generate a lot of mana and play a large number of spells in a single turn
A Mardu control deck that can play a variety of strategies, including combos, control, and midrange

data.itemName: Dargo, the Shipwrecker / Thrasios, Triton Hero
data.itemDescription: A Temur tempo deck that can disrupt its opponents' plans and win the game through card advantage or combat
A Dimir ninja tribal deck that can quickly kill its opponents with unblockable creatures
A Golgari landfall deck that can generate a lot of value and win the game through land combos

data.itemName: Tevesh Szat, Doom Eternal / Kraum, Ludevic's Opus
data.itemDescription: A Grixis control deck that can disrupt its opponents' plans and win the game through combos or card advantage
A Mardu prowess deck that can quickly cheat out powerful creatures and win through combat
A Golgari landfall deck that can generate a lot of value and win the game through land combos
